card.short: returns a card; has many options
card.long:
Provide a card name and I'll return the card's text as well as its picture.
Without a card, I'll return a random card
You can use ``--type=`` for card type or ``--tribe=`` for a Tribe (no space after the =).
Additional options are ``--min``, ``--max``, ``--detailed``, ``--text``, ``--stats``

stats.short: returns the stats of a card

text.short: returns the text and attributes of a card without the image

fullart.long: You provide a card name, I'll look for its full art.

find.short: returns card names that contain supplied input
find.long: I'll search for card names that contain the letters you provide.

banlist.short: You can use `!format` for the list of formats
banlist.long:
Ask me about the banlist or why a card is/should be banned.
There are different formats with their own banlists.

tierlist.short: returns the tierlist or a subsection based on tribe or tier

starters.long: I'll provide a list of starter decks. Default are Afjak's TCO starter decks, but you can add --king or --metal for different ones.

good.short: takes a card type, or a tribe and type
good.long:
Asking about good cards? What'cha looking for?
I can give by type, or if you need something more specific: by build point or tribe.
``!good M'arrillian Creatures``
 ``!good Attacks 1``

lf.short: adds or removes specific match making roles

rulebook.long:
You can ask for a different different rulebooks. If you don't tell me otherwise, I'll return the equivalent of ``!rulebook EN AU``
For a list of all rulebooks I have, type ``!rulebook --list``

faq.short: answers to some of the common questions

rule.short: returns the definition of the rule

rate.short: rate's a Creature based on its stats.

tribe.short: you can join your favorite tribe (or lack thereof)
tribe.long:
Here are the tribes you can join:
 <:Dan:294942889337683968> Danian, <:Mip:294941790052679690> Mipedian, <:Mar:294942283273601044> M'arrillian, <:OW:294939978897555457> OverWorld, <:UW:294943282943885313> UnderWorld, <:TL:294945357392248833> Tribeless
You can only be loyal to one... but you can always switch.

language.short: Connect with other players of the same language!
language.long: To find out what languages you can join use ``!languages list``

watch.long:
You can watch Chaotic in various languages!
If a season number is followed by SD it isn't high definition.
For a list of all episodes I have, type ``!watch --list``

perim.short: For all commands related to the scanquest use !perim help
